name: Yohane the Parhelion - NUMAZU in the MIRAGE
name_original: Yohane the Parhelion - NUMAZU in the MIRAGE
description:
A deckbuilding roguelite played using magical cards!
Another Yohane story is here!!



■『Yohane the Parhelion - NUMAZU in the MIRAGE -』
Yohane the Parhelion is an official spin-off of ""Love Live! Sunshine"". 『Yohane the Parhelion - NUMAZU in the MIRAGE -』 is a deckbuilding roguelite set in that world.

While working as a fortune teller in Numazu, Yohane spends her days with her friends.
By chance, she comes into possession of an old mirror.

Worried that her fortune-telling isn't accurate, Yohane decides to perform ""Magic Mirror Fortune-Telling"" using it.
Suddenly, the mirror begins glowing, and sucks Yohane in!

What she finds in the mirror is ""Reverse-Numazu,"" which is a reversed replica of the real Numazu!
Moreover, in that mysterious world, magic could be used with the power of cards.
At the same time, strange things begin happening to her friends in the real world, one after another.
In order to save them, Yohane must go through ""Reverse-Numazu""!
What awaits her?

A mysterious mirror world that changes each time it's entered.
After countless choices, what future will Yohane choose?
A new story begins in the other Numazu!

■Deckbuilding and card battles in ""Reverse-Numazu"" where magic can be used!
Adventure through Numazu in the mirror.
Aim for the deepest level of the ""Reverse-Numazu"" by making full use of the cards you have obtained!



■A wide range of deck construction with more than 150 types of cards!
Collect cards as you adventure through ""Reverse-Numazu"" and build powerful decks of your own creation!



■Summon your trusty friends with Summon Cards!
You can summon powerful friends in ""Reverse-Numazu"".
Summon Yohane's friends to help you out in a pinch!



■Prepare for your next adventure at the Fortune-Telling Shack!
By completing quests in your adventures, you can power up Yohane!
Also, in the 'Closet', you can change into various costumes.
By changing initial cards and charms this way, you can acquire abilities that are different from your usual outfit!



■Endlessly replayable layout-changing maps! There's infinite strategies!?
Once cleared, the map changes its layout every time you enter.
A bargain system that lets you play forever!



■Charms to make you stronger than the strongest! Create your strength with Cards x Charms!
""Charms"" are items with powerful effects.
Combine them with your cards to become more powerful than the strongest!
